item.title: Keep Calm And ...
item.description: I needed some new wall «art» for my home office, and decided that a couple of small «Keep Calm» posters would do the trick. Naturally I got a bit carried away, and created more than one, and of course, most of them are virtualization related: If you have some ideas, IÂ´ll gladly create more, just leave a comment! I would also love photos if you printed out any of these and put them on a wall or in a frame somewhere.
